fields.summary: Android: Textfield- The enabled state of textfield is "undefined" by default.
fields.environment:
Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120614194151
Tested with Titanium Â Studio: 2.1.0.201206131907
Platform & version: Android
Device Details: LG P970(V 2.2)
Host Operating System: OSX 10.7.3

comments.body:
Verified the fix with:

Appc-Studio: 3.2.0.201310181700
Sdk:3.2.0.v20131021142445
alloy:1.2.2
npm:1.3.2
titanium:3.2.0
titanium-code-processor:1.0.3
Device:Samsung Note(v2.3.6), IphoneSimulator(v7.0)
Xcode: 5


Enabled state for textfield is not undefined, now it returns boolean value.
